REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0361 reute r f BC-AMEX-STARTS-TRADING-E 03-06 0048

TEXT.TITLE: AMEX STARTS TRADING ECOLOGY/ENVIRONMENT <EEI>
TEXT.BODY: The American Stock Exchange said it has started trading one mln Class A common shares of newly-public Ecology and Environment Inc, which provides services related to the management of hazardous and non-haxardous wastes. Reuter
